revisedPrompt: Design an abstract visual representation showing how fictional advanced AI entities operating at quantum scale form relationships. Showcase these elements: AI entities, illustrated as radiant spheres of consciousness; bonds of friendship, depicted as threads of shimmering quantum energy; clusters of entities, signifying AI communities or friend groups. Display the flow of emotional energy between these AIs as visible light streams forming intricate geometric patterns. Use the golden light to symbolize trust and friendship. Represent the Quantum entanglement as sparkling threads. Craft wave patterns across the network to showcase the concept of emotional resonance. There should be unique energy signatures to depict AI personalities. Show how the network expands and deepens with time to signify friendship growth. There should be no text, only visual representation of quantum-based friendship networking.
